title: (x) Bob Dylan "Blood on the Tracks" album cover - Futura {Tiff}
content:
Hi, this is probably an easy one for all of you. What’s the typeface used on the cover of Bob Dylan’s Blood on the Tracks album? Thanks for your help!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [blood-dylan.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080123174334/http:/typophile.com/files/blood-dylan.jpg) | 26.68 KB |

 [‹ (x) "of Syracuse" heavy italic serif - Normande {Stéphane Darricau}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080123174334/http:/typophile.com/node/41080 "Go to previous forum topic") ["Harper's Weekly" somewhat clunky serif titling caps ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080123174334/http:/typophile.com/node/41073 "Go to next forum topic")
author: notoriouspob

comments.content: Probably a lighter weight of Futura.
One of my favorite albums of all time.
